verses.verse: For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is going to <S%H5493>remove<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> Both <S%H4937>supply<s%> and <S%H9306>support,<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H9305>supply<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> And the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H9305>supply<s%> of <S%H4325>water;<s%>
The <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>man<s%> and the <S%H4421>warrior,<s%> The <S%H8199>judge<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> The <S%H7080>diviner<s%> and the <S%H2205>elder,<s%>

The <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and the <S%H5375>honorable<s%> <S%H6440><s%> man, The <S%H3289>counselor<s%> and the <S%H2450>expert<s%> <S%H2796>artisan,<s%> And the <S%H995>skillful<s%> <S%H3908>enchanter.<s%>
And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> mere <S%H5288>lads<s%> their <S%H8269>princes<s%> And <S%H8586>capricious<s%> <S%H8586>children<s%> will <S%H4910>rule<s%> over them,

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> will be <S%H5065>oppressed,<s%> <S%H376>Each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> by <S%H376>another,<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> by his <S%H7453>neighbor;<s%> The <S%H5288>youth<s%> will <S%H7292>storm<s%> against the <S%H2205>elder,<s%> And the <S%H7034>inferior<s%> against the <S%H3513>honorable.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H8610>lays<s%> <S%H8610>hold<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> in his father's <S%H1004>house,<s%> [saying,] "You have a <S%H8071>cloak,<s%> you shall be our <S%H7101>ruler,<s%> And <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H4384>ruins<s%> will be <S%H8478>under<s%> your <S%H3027>charge,<s%>"

On that <S%H3117>day<s%> will he <S%H5375>protest,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I will not be [your] <S%H2280>healer,<s%> For in my <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H8071>cloak;<s%> You should not <S%H7760>appoint<s%> me <S%H7101>ruler<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>"

For <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> has <S%H3782>stumbled,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> has <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> their <S%H3956>speech<s%> and their <S%H4611>actions<s%> are <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> To <S%H4784>rebel<s%> against His <S%H9202>glorious<s%> <S%H5869>presence.<s%>

The <S%H1971>expression<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H6030>bears<s%> <S%H6030>witness<s%> against them. And they <S%H5046>display<s%> their <S%H9128>sin<s%> like <S%H5467>Sodom;<s%> They do not [even] <S%H3582>conceal<s%> [it.] <S%H188>Woe<s%> to them! For they have <S%H1580>brought<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> on themselves.
<S%H559>Say<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> that [it will go] <S%H2895>well<s%> [with them,] For they will <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their <S%H4611>actions.<s%>
<S%H188>Woe<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked!<s%> [It will go] <S%H7451>badly<s%> [with him,] For <S%H1576>what<s%> <S%H3027><s%> he <S%H1576>deserves<s%> <S%H3027><s%> will be <S%H6213>done<s%> to him.

O My <S%H5971>people!<s%> Their <S%H5065>oppressors<s%> are <S%H9413>children,<s%> And <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H4910>rule<s%> over them. O My <S%H5971>people!<s%> Those who <S%H833>guide<s%> you <S%H8582>lead<s%> [you] <S%H8582>astray,<s%> And <S%H1104>confuse<s%> the <S%H1870>direction<s%> of your <S%H734>paths.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5324>arises<s%> to <S%H7378>contend,<s%> And <S%H5975>stands<s%> to <S%H1777>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H935>enters<s%> into <S%H4941>judgment<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%> of His <S%H5971>people,<s%> "It is you who have <S%H1197>devoured<s%> the <S%H3754>vineyard;<s%> The <S%H1500>plunder<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> is in your <S%H1004>houses.<s%>

<S%H4100>"What<s%> do you mean by <S%H1792>crushing<s%> My <S%H5971>people,<s%> And <S%H2912>grinding<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%>?" <S%H5002>Declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

Moreover, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> are <S%H1361>proud,<s%> And <S%H1980>walk<s%> with <S%H1627>heads<s%> <S%H5186>held<s%> <S%H5186>high<s%> and <S%H8265>seductive<s%> <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> And <S%H1980>go<s%> along with <S%H2952>mincing<s%> <S%H2952>steps,<s%> And <S%H5913>tinkle<s%> the <S%H5913>bangles<s%> on their <S%H7272>feet,<s%>

Therefore the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will <S%H9626>afflict<s%> the <S%H6936>scalp<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with <S%H9626>scabs,<s%> And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6168>make<s%> their <S%H6596>foreheads<s%> <S%H6168>bare.<s%>"

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H8597>beauty<s%> of [their] <S%H5914>anklets,<s%> <S%H7636>headbands,<s%> <S%H7720>crescent<s%> <S%H7720>ornaments,<s%>
<S%H5188>dangling<s%> <S%H5188>earrings,<s%> <S%H8285>bracelets,<s%> <S%H7479>veils,<s%>
<S%H6287>headdresses,<s%> <S%H9493>ankle<s%> <S%H9493>chains,<s%> <S%H7196>sashes,<s%> <S%H1004>perfume<s%> <S%H5315><s%> <S%H1004>boxes,<s%> <S%H3908>amulets,<s%>
<S%H2885>finger<s%> <S%H2885>rings,<s%> <S%H639>nose<s%> <S%H5141>rings,<s%>
<S%H4254>festal<s%> <S%H4254>robes,<s%> <S%H4595>outer<s%> <S%H4595>tunics,<s%> <S%H4304>cloaks,<s%> <S%H2754>money<s%> <S%H2754>purses,<s%>
<S%H1549>hand<s%> <S%H1549>mirrors,<s%> <S%H5466>undergarments,<s%> <S%H6797>turbans,<s%> and <S%H7289>veils.<s%>

Now it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H1314>sweet<s%> <S%H1314>perfume<s%> there will be <S%H4716>putrefaction;<s%> <S%H8478>Instead<s%> of a <S%H9118>belt,<s%> a <S%H5364>rope;<s%> <S%H8478>Instead<s%> of well-set <S%H4748>hair,<s%> a plucked-out <S%H7144>scalp;<s%> <S%H8478>Instead<s%> of <S%H6614>fine<s%> <S%H6614>clothes,<s%> a <S%H4228>donning<s%> of <S%H8242>sackcloth;<s%> And <S%H3587>branding<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>
Your <S%H4962>men<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> And your <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H1369>ones<s%> in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
And her <S%H6607>gates<s%> will <S%H578>lament<s%> and <S%H56>mourn;<s%> And <S%H5352>deserted<s%> she will <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
